author: guy_joseph
post: I am an old fan of George Noory, and his full team of specialists in various fields. Since working in security, I had the pleasure of listening to most of the information that’s very interesting, informative, and accurate. I thank Coast to Coast, and all of its Staff, for all the trouble taken to assimilate and sift, and then broadcast for the thousands of your fans. Sincerely, Guy (navy67228guy@yahoo.com).
title: SHROUD OF TURIN from “COAST TO COAST AM” on YouTube and Show’s Website

author: guy_joseph
post: Even though I am not regular in correspondence, it would be honor for me to contact George Noori. Can I get his e mail address?.
